title: Mathematics Education Applying Problem-Based Learning (PBL) and JAS Approach for Critical Thinking and Creativity Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: Learners must acquire problem-solving skills in contexts resembling actual work environments, with emphasis on collaboration using digital tools

learning_goals: Learners can analyze given mathematical problems and creatively propose at least three or more solution strategies
Learners can present logical reasoning using critical thinking skills during the process of solving complex problems through PBL activities
Learners can apply the JAS approach to convert data collected from their surroundings into mathematical models and utilize them for problem-solving
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
